attributes.action: Cancel all taxpayer money currently paid to the H.M the Queen and instead give the revenues from the crown estates to her.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The monarch costs taxpayers £40,000,000 a year not including security costs.
Most of us like having a monarchy but not the cost but there is a simple solution.
The government should hand back the revenues from the hereditory crown estates back to H.M the Queen in exchange for cancelling all taxpayers funding to the monarchy
Last year the crown estates made almost £200,000,000 which was surrendered to the exchequer in exchange for taxpayers money, if the government handed the crown estates revenues back to H.M the Queen she would have enough to pay for the repairs to the palaces and all other costs the royal family incur and best of all it wouldn't cost us tax payers a penny! 
We could all sit back, relax and enjoy the monarchy without having to pay a penny for it!
It worked that way for hundreds of years and i don't see why it couldn't again.
